price: "İbrahim’in korkusu gidip kendisine müjde gelince, Lût kavmi hakkında bizim (elçilerimiz) le tartışmaya koyuldu."
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوۡعُ وَجَآءَتۡهُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَٰدِلُنَا فِي قَوۡمِ لُوطٍ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahaba ʿan ib'rāhīma al-rawʿu wajāathu al-bush'rā yujādilunā fī qawmi lūṭin
